Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Goody \Good"y\, n.; pl. {Goodies}. 1. A bonbon, cake, or the like; -- usually in the pl. [Colloq.] [1913 Webster]
2. (Zo["o]l.) An American fish; the lafayette or spot. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Goody \Good"y\, n.; pl. {Goodies}. [Prob. contr. from goodwife.] Goodwife; -- a low term of civility or sport. [1913 Webster]
